name: Four Cheese Pasta
desp: Parmesan, Cheddar, Brie, and Emmental in a cheesy pasta.

name: Pasta Carbonara
desp: Pasta popular with coal miners, traditionally made with guanciale.

name: Gnocchi with Tomato Sauce
desp: Gnocchi dumplings with wheat flour, potato, semolina, egg, breadcrumbs.

name: Pasta Con Pomodoro E Basilico
desp: Pasta with tomato and basil sauce, simple and classic.

name: Home-Style Baked Pasta
desp: Pasta, cheese, veggies, and tomato sauce baked till golden.

name: Ravioli with Coconut Milk & Lemongrass
desp: Ravioli stuffed with veggie mix, drizzled with coconut milk sauce.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
desp: Bacon, eggs, and parmesan cheese in a protein-packed dish.

name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
desp: Shrimps in a low-fat, low-calorie, protein-rich pasta dish.

name: Skillet Italian Sausage and Peppers with Penne
desp: Italian sausage with high protein, served with peppers and penne.

name: Chicken Bruschetta Pasta
desp: Chicken with pasta, a family favorite with chewy, soft textures.
